alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duchesne...east central Summit and southeastern Uinta Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northeast of Tabiona, or 22 miles north of Duchesne, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Altonah, Kings Peak and Mountain Home. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
